name: Mushroom Garden Prime
description:
The hit series Mushroom Garden is going back to its roots! It's a prime time to be a mushroom lover!
Were you a funghi fanatic back in the day? Or is this your first time encountering these funghi friends? Either way, welcome to their world!
Are you ready to begin your mushroom gardening life?


- We're going back to our roots in this fresh remake of the first two games!
We're celebrating 10 years of mushroom gardening by going back to where it all began!
Mushroom Garden Prime combines Mushroom Garden and Mushroom Garden Seasons into one new and improved package!
Enjoy both gardens in one single app!

- Double the funghi, double the fun!
Play in the Original and Seasonal gardens at the same time in landscape mode!
Feed and pick funghi from both gardens in one go! Harvest more funghi than ever before! What a rush!

- Discover all-new seasons and rare funghi!
This game nearly doubles the number of rare funghi from 185 to a whopping 324!
And that's not all! This game comes with three entirely new Seasonal gardens!

- New features exclusive to Mushroom Garden Prime! Request Panel and Funghi Museum
These features can only be found in Mushroom Garden Prime!
Clear requests on the Request Panel to unlock exclusive wallpapers and more!
Visit the Funghi Museum to check out your very own funghi diorama!
(Funghi will be added to the museum once a certain number of that funghi has been picked. Funghi will be placed in a pre-determined location.)


Whether you're new to the game or a 10-year veteran, we're proud to present the ultimate Mushroom Garden experience to everyone! Join us and enjoy the latest and greatest in mushroom gardening!
